physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Bilateral cryptorchidism, height 115 cm (8.5 years), bone age 5 years, peak GH response during insulin tolerance testing blunted, cortisol levels normal.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At 13.5 years, height 132.8 cm, bone age 10 years; at 15 years, testicular volume increased from approximately 2.5 to 7.0 ml after testosterone treatment. At 17 years, height was 145.5 cm, bone age 12 years, with declining testosterone levels and blunted LH, FSH peak levels in response to GnRH. Hormonal re-evaluation showed GH, TSH, LH, and FSH deficiencies.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Sister presented with short stature, 144 cm (15 years), bone age 12.5 years, Tanner stage M1P1 with GH, TSH, and gonadotropin deficiencies.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Hormonal evaluation showed deficiencies; she initiated hGH and later estrogen therapy. Her final height was 150 cm after two years of estrogen therapy.
